## Erc721WithQuantitySignatureMintable class

Enables generating dynamic ERC721 NFTs with rules and an associated signature, which can then be minted by anyone securely

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Erc721WithQuantitySignatureMintable implements DetectableFeature 
```
<b>Implements:</b> DetectableFeature

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [generate(mintRequest)](./sdk.erc721withquantitysignaturemintable.generate.md) |  | Generate a signature that can be used to mint a dynamic NFT |
|  [generateBatch(payloadsToSign)](./sdk.erc721withquantitysignaturemintable.generatebatch.md) |  | Genrate a batch of signatures that can be used to mint many dynamic NFTs. |
|  [mint(signedPayload)](./sdk.erc721withquantitysignaturemintable.mint.md) |  | Mint a dynamically generated NFT |
|  [mintBatch(signedPayloads)](./sdk.erc721withquantitysignaturemintable.mintbatch.md) |  | Mint any number of dynamically generated NFT at once |
|  [verify(signedPayload)](./sdk.erc721withquantitysignaturemintable.verify.md) |  | Verify that a payload is correctly signed |
